mapper.select: select * from branch_realtime where branch_id = #{branchId} and time between DATE_ADD(#{datetime}, interval -1 DAY) and #{datetime}
select * from branch_history where branch_id = #{branchId} and date = #{date}
select * from branch_history where branch_id = #{branchId} and date between #{begin} and #{end} limit #{offset}, #{limit}
select count(*) from branch_history where branch_id = #{branchId} and date between #{begin} and #{end}

select #{branchId} as branch_id, sum(watch_num) as watch_num, sum(gift) as gift, sum(bullet_screen) as bullet_screen, time as time from group_realtime where group_id in (select group_id from struc_manage where branch_id = #{branchId} group by group_id) and time = #{datetime}
